Docs.summary: Provides a string that describes an individual configuration property. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsDescriptionAttribute> is intended to assist both design time tools and administrative run time tools in identifying and describing the associated configuration property.
This attribute is optional and can only be applied at the individual configuration property level.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Although the description has a theoretical maximum length of the <xref:System.String> class, whose length is represented by a <xref:System.Int32>, the following two practical considerations will limit the size of the `description` parameter:
- Large text descriptions are difficult to display in a user interface (UI) and difficult for the user to read.
- Settings providers may enforce overall usage quotas and are required to enforce user configuration quotas.
